participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Emily loves to explore new activities and meet new people.
participant_1.background: I live a life of fun and adventures with my friends and love capturing the moments with my iPhone. My weekends are filled with bird watching. I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time. I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking. I work as a lifeguard during summer and help out at my family's restaurant during the off season.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and free-spirited, Jake enjoys life on the road and values his independence.
participant_2.background: I'm single and enjoy my freedom to drive around with the wind in my hair. I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions. I love the freedom of riding my motorcycle, and I look forward to one day taking my kids on rides with me. I like eating pretzels. None of my family members work in the medical field.

content.text: Hi!
Hi! How are you?
I'm doing well! What about you?
I'm doing pretty great! I just got back from a long weekend trip to the beach.
Oh nice! I wish I was there! I love going to the beach.
I'm sure you'll get to go soon. What do you like to do at the beach?
I like to swim, sunbathe, and play in the sand. I also like to go bird watching.
I love swimming and sunbathing too! I've never been bird watching, but it sounds like fun.
It is! You can see all kinds of different birds.
I'll have to try it sometime. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, dance, and hang out with friends. I also like to play video games.
I also love concerts! I'm not much of a dancer, but I do like to go to concerts and listen to music. I also like to play video games.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
We do! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
Me too! What are you up to this weekend?
Not much, just hanging out with friends and relaxing.
That sounds fun! I'm going to be working at my family's restaurant.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I love working with my family.
It's usually a lot of fun, but it can be a lot of work too.
I know what you mean! But it's always worth it to spend time with my family.
I agree!
